channel.title: R on A jwlearn website
channel.description: Recent content in R on A jwlearn website

item.title: R 4.1.0 new features
item.description: Native pipe # R 4.1.0 rnorm(100, mean = 4, sd = 1) |> density() |> plot() Short anonymous function F1 <- \(x) x^2 + 2*x + 1 class(F1) ## [1] "function" Deriv::Deriv(F1) ## function (x) ## 2 + 2 * x curve(F1) Amazing operation mtcars |> subset(cyl == 4) |> {\(d) lm(mpg ~ disp, data = d)}() ## ## Call: ## lm(formula = mpg ~ disp, data = d) ## ## Coefficients: ## (Intercept) disp ## 40.
